comments.author: nathaliewithanh
comments.content:
Hi there! Just dropping by from very hot Texas. Something in your text stopped me in my tracks, I guess it was your expectation of others to give you a goal... I've always assumed these things came from within.
At least, there is always sushi!

Tot Ziens!

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: Hm. It's not exactly what I meant, but you do have a point, of course. Of course I set my own goals, and if I didn't I wouldn't be living my own life. I'm disappointed that I can't be satisfied with having a goal that exists for other people. I can't quite put it into words right now. Maybe I"ll write about it later. Now I have to go to work :S

comments.author: Kamil
comments.content: The heat is killing me...need to go to hokkaido....
